scripts.build: curl -O https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && tar xf flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && export PUB_CACHE=./.pub-cache && git config --global --add safe.directory '*' && ./flutter/bin/flutter config --enable-web --no-analytics && ./flutter/bin/flutter build web --release --base-href=/ 2>&1 | tee build.log; if [ -f build/web/index.html ] && [ -f build/web/main.dart.js ]; then echo '✓ Build successful - all files generated'; exit 0; else echo '✗ Build failed - missing output files'; cat build.log; exit 1; fi
